snippet: A vast new CD set of music conducted by Pierre Boulez is rare for its scrupulous attention to both classical and contemporary, and highlights just how radical his New York Philharmonic tenure was.
abstract: Sony Classical releases boxed set Pierre Boulez: The Complete Columbia Album Collection in time for Boulez's 90th birthday; set includes some recordings that have been difficult to find.
lead_paragraph: A vast new CD set of music conducted by Pierre Boulez is rare for its scrupulous attention to both classical and contemporary, and highlights just how radical his New York Philharmonic tenure was.

headline.seo: ‘Pierre Boulez: The Complete Columbia Album Collection’
headline.main: Recapturing the Radical on the Podium
